name: Naizu-Ha
description: The Naizu-Ha is a small, treacherous fey creature, notable for its scissor claws and scythe tail. Its greenish form allows it to blend in with natural surroundings.
memorable: The Naizu-Ha can transform into a magical dagger, adding a layer of danger to its encounters.
goals: To ambush and deceive enemies, using its abilities to manipulate combat.
relations: Associated with other fey creatures and likely encountered alongside cunning tricksters.
environment: Commonly found in forests or areas rich with natural magic.
strengths: High Armor Class and Hit Points provide strong defensive capabilities, along with unique abilities that hinder melee attackers.
weaknesses: Average Wisdom and Intelligence scores may limit its effectiveness in certain strategies.
attacks: Can deliver slashing damage through scissor claws and scythe tail, and automatically hits prone creatures with dagger legs.
most_powerful_ability: Blunting Ambiance, which reduces damage from melee attacks.
skills: Excels in stealth, making it very difficult to detect.
additional_information: Condition immunities to being blinded or grappled.
Can climb surfaces effortlessly with Spider Climb.
Can knock opponents prone with its Tripping Charge ability.
Able to make three attacks in a single turn with Multiattack.
Dagger Form provides a significant risk-reward dynamic in combat.

ambush creature that reduces melee damage
tricky fey that can climb walls
creature with high stealth and defensive abilities
